Adjustable grip: The grip of the ski poles can be made adjustable to accommodate different hand sizes and preferences, providing a better and more comfortable fit.
Wrist straps: Adding wrist straps to the ski poles can prevent them from slipping out of the hands during falls or when not in use.
Gloves or sleeves: Providing gloves or sleeves made of waterproof materials can protect the hands from cold and wet conditions while skiing.
Multi-functional: Ski poles can be designed to serve multiple functions, such as a trekking pole or a walking stick, providing additional utility for outdoor enthusiasts.
Customizable: Allowing users to customize the ski poles with different colors, patterns, or designs can add a personal touch and make them more appealing.
